name: ev3dev-cod3r
description: Code tool, that lets you program in your browser Python & Javascript, and it comes with a file manager. Cod3r is based on Pathfind3r & Tiny File manager ## Dependencies 1. Ev3 should be started using ev3dev debian linux distribution (https://www.ev3dev.org/docs/getting-started/). 2. Local git should be set up on the ev3dev. There is a good tutorial about setting up the development environment at this address -> http://www.ev3dev.org/docs/tutorials/setting-up-python-pycharm/
